languages.text: {n}Шипение вокса похоже на мученический хрип.{/n} "Осуществляю постижение. Принципы работы ксеноаугментов чужды освященному Деус Механикус канону, но... квантифицируемы. Они кормятся моими кровью и зарядом моей силовой катушки, словно паразиты, я же кормлюсь их тайной и вынашиваю в себе новое понимание. Это болезненно. Это необходимо".

{n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."
languages.original_text: {n}Шипение вокса похоже на мученический хрип.{/n} "Осуществляю постижение. Принципы работы ксеноаугментов чужды освященному Деус Механикус канону, но... квантифицируемы. Они кормятся моими кровью и зарядом моей силовой катушки, словно паразиты, я же кормлюсь их тайной и вынашиваю в себе новое понимание. Это болезненно. Это необходимо".

languages.text: {n}音阵合成器发出了嘶嘶声，听起来像是充满痛苦的呻吟。{/n}“正在进行理解。尽管异形植入物的运作原理与万机之神祝福的圣典不同，但依然是……可以量化的。它们就像寄生虫一样，以我的血液与我的潜能线圈的电流为食。但与此同时，我也同样以它们的神秘本质为食，因为我的头脑中正在孕育着全新的领悟。这个过程很痛苦，但也很有必要。”
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵合成器发出了嘶嘶声，听起来像是充满痛苦的呻吟。{/n}“正在进行理解。尽管异形植入物的运作原理与万机之神祝福的圣典不同，但依然是……可以量化的。它们就像寄生虫一样，以我的血液与我的潜能线圈的电流为食。但与此同时，我也同样以它们的神秘本质为食，因为我的头脑中正在孕育着全新的领悟。这个过程很痛苦，但也很有必要。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El siseo del voco recuerda a un gemido torturado.{/n} «Comprensión en curso. Los principios operativos de los xenoauméticos, aunque ajenos a los cánones bendecidos por el Deus Mechanicus, son... cuantificables. Se alimentan de forma parasitaria de mi sangre y de la carga de mi bobina Potentia. A mi vez, me alimento de su misterio, que nutre nueva comprensión en mi interior. Es doloroso. Y necesario».
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

Los principios operativos de los xenoauméticos, aunque ajenos a los cánones bendecidos por el Deus Mechanicus, son... cuantificables. Se alimentan de forma parasitaria de mi sangre y de la carga de mi bobina Potentia. A mi vez, me alimento de su misterio, que nutre nueva comprensión en mi interior. Es doloroso. Y necesario».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスからの電子音は、拷問を受けたようなうめき声を思わせるものだった。{/n}「理解を処理中。ゼノ・オーグメティックの作動原理は、デウス・メカニカスの祝福を受けた規範とは異質だが、それでも…数値化できるものだ。彼らは寄生虫のように、私の血液とポテンティアコイルの電荷を餌にしている。私は逆に、自分の中に新たな理解力を育みながら、彼らの神秘を糧とする。それは痛みを伴う。必要なことなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスからの電子音は、拷問を受けたようなうめき声を思わせるものだった。{/n}「理解を処理中。ゼノ・オーグメティックの作動原理は、デウス・メカニカスの祝福を受けた規範とは異質だが、それでも…数値化できるものだ。彼らは寄生虫のように、私の血液とポテンティアコイルの電荷を餌にしている。私は逆に、自分の中に新たな理解力を育みながら、彼らの神秘を糧とする。それは痛みを伴う。必要なことなのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Zischen aus dem Vox erinnert an ein gequältes Stöhnen.{/n} "Verständnisvorgang aktiv. Die Arbeitsprinzipien der Xeno-Augmetik sind dem vom Deus Mechanicus gesegneten Kanon war fremd, dennoch aber ... quantifizierbar. Sie ernähren sich wie Parasiten von meinem Blut und der Ladung meiner Potentia-Spule. Ich wiederum ernähre mich von ihrem Mysterium, das in mir neues Verständnis fördert. Es ist schmerzhaft. Es ist notwendig."
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

Es ist notwendig."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sifflement de la voix rappelle un grognement torturé.{/n} « Compréhension en cours. Les principes opératoires des xéno-augmétiques, bien qu'étrangers au canon béni par le Deus Mechanicus, sont pour le moins... quantifiables. Tels des parasites, ils se nourrissent de mon sang et de la charge de mon transformateur de puissance. En retour, je dévore leur mystère pour encourager en moi une nouvelle compréhension. Le processus est douloureux, mais nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

languages.text: {n}Vokstan çıkan tıslama, acılı bir iniltiyi andırıyor.{/n} "İdrak süreci devam ediyor. Zeno ogmetiklerinin çalışma prensibi, Deus Mechanicus'un kutsadığı nizamnamelere yabancı olmakla birlikte ölçülebilir nitelikte. Parazit misali kanımdan ve salahiyet bobinimin gücünden beslenmekteler. Ben de karşılık olarak onların gizeminden besleniyor, içimde yeni bir algı ufku oluşturuyorum. Acı verici. Gerekli."
languages.original_text: {n}The hissing from the vox is reminiscent of a tortured groan.{/n} "Comprehension in progress. The operating principles of xeno-augmetics, while alien to the canon blessed by the Deus Mechanicus, are nonetheless... quantifiable. They feed, as parasites do, on my blood and the charge of my potentia coil. I, in turn, feed on their mystery as I nurse new comprehension within me. It is painful. It is necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan çıkan tıslama, acılı bir iniltiyi andırıyor.{/n} "İdrak süreci devam etmekte. Zeno ogmetiklerin çalışma prensibi, her ne kadar Deus Mechanicus tarafından kutsanmış nizamlara yabancı olsa da, yine de ölçülebilir nitelikte. Parazit misali kanımdan ve salahiyet bobinimin gücünden beslenmekteler. Ben de karşılık olarak onların gizeminden besleniyor, içimde yeni bir algı ufku oluşmasını sağlıyorum. Acı verici. Gerekli."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
